sql_table.users: create table if not exists users (`user_id` int primary key auto_increment,`username` varchar(128) not null, `email` varchar(128) not null,`password` varchar(128) not null,`jwt_access` varchar(500), `jwt_refresh` varchar(500),`perms` int references perms(perms_id), `ip` varchar(64))
sql_table.todo: create table if not exists todo(`todo_id` int primary key auto_increment, `user` int references users(user_id), `title` varchar(128) not null, `description` varchar(128) not null)
sql_table.perms: create table if not exists perms (`perms_id` int primary key auto_increment, `permission` varchar(128) not null, `group` varchar(128) not null)
